mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.sms_plat_url AS smsPlatUrl, a.sms_plat_account AS smsPlatAccount, a.sms_plat_password AS smsPlatPassword, a.sender_name AS senderName, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag
